thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 7 of 110
thread.title: GALE

author: GALE
title: GALE
text: User friendly, do at own pace and setting of your choice, informative, organized, and enjoyable. I highly recommend. (Got certificate quickly, too.) The only negative I saw was a few questions that dealt with statistical data. They really shouldn't be included in the testing. Remembering the number of highway accidents, for example, does not inform nor improve the driving ability of the course participant. (Felt like the only reason they were there - to be gotcha questions!)
